select distinct t.id,t.grade,t.clazz_name,t.admission_date,t.is_graduated from clazz t left join school_staff_clazz ssc on t.id = ssc.clazz_id left join school_staff ss on ss.id = ssc.school_staff_id left join sys_user su on su.id = ss.user_id
t.is_deleted = 0
and t.school_id = #{p.schoolId}
and (LOCATE(#{p.query}, t.id) > 0 or LOCATE(#{p.query}, t.admission_date) > 0 or LOCATE(#{p.query}, AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(su.name), #{key})) > 0 )
order by id desc

select t.id, t.grade, t.clazz_name from clazz t inner join school_staff_clazz ssc on t.id = ssc.clazz_id inner join school_staff ss on ss.id = ssc.school_staff_id where t.school_id = #{schoolId} and ss.type = 2 and ss.user_id = #{userId}
select t.id, t.grade, t.clazz_name from clazz t where t.school_id = #{schoolId} and is_deleted = 0

select IF(count(0) > 0, TRUE, FALSE) from clazz t inner join school_staff_clazz ssc on t.id = ssc.clazz_id inner join school_staff ss on ss.id = ssc.school_staff_id inner join student_base_info b on b.clazz_id = t.id where ss.user_id = #{headerTeacherUserId} and b.user_id = #{studentUserId}
